thread.title: Student Athlete of the Week | Zachary Kahn
thread.title_full: Student Athlete of the Week | Zachary Kahn

author: Reggie Young
title: Student Athlete of the Week | Zachary Kahn
text:
Student athlete of the week WEWS Reggie Young Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. Show Caption Previous Next 
STRONGSVILLE, Ohio - Running back and captain Zachary Kahn knows how to gain yards and find the end zone for the Mustangs. 
His hard work on the field shows what type of athlete Zachary really is. So far this season he has 1358 yards rushing and nine touchdowns. 
"He carries the football he carries the mail for us every Friday night. We count on him a lot for our offensive yards. What he does better is he leads our football team. He's the leader of our football team," said head football coach Larry Laird. 
Zachary is also a baseball player. 
While his athletics are very impressive, his academic record is just as impressive. As a member of the National Honor Society and Rho Kappa social studies honor society and he has a 4.1 GPA. 
"One day my sports career is going to come to an end and after that I'm going to have to go out into the real world and get a job. My academics are going to prepare me to get a job," Zachary said.
